name: Barnard: the Barntender Robot
description:
This game was made in four days for the Weekly Game Jam 152 with the theme 'shelter'.

It is a simple game inspired by Overcooked, where a robot, Barnard, has to take care of a rabbit by feeding it.

All the content of this game, except the font, was made by me. More informations are available on the Github repository, where you can find the sources.

The pixel font from TinyWorlds, Thaleah, which has a CC-BY 3.0 license and is available here, was used in this project.

Gameplay

You move with the directional keys, and you interact with objects with 'space'. That's it. Your goal is to give the correct food to the rabbit. Note that some items can be cut on the table at the bottom.
